text:
WATCH: Ricky Martin Turn Up the Heat in Hot New Music Video 'Fiebre,' Featuring Wisin and Yandel

Ricky Martin’s is raising temperatures worldwide with hot new music video, “Fiebre” (“Fever”). The Puerto Rican star’s new video, featuring fellow boricua reggaetoneros Wisin and Yandel, was released last week, amassing more than 13 million views on YouTube in six days. Before the video’s debut, fans thrilled at a sneak peek the singer shared on Instagram. “Spectacular. You melt glaciers,” one wrote. “Pure fire the video, the lyrics, the music. I loved it,” another gushed.

The video, recorded in January in Puerto Vallarta, Mexico, shows breathtaking views of the beach resort town, an indigenous warrior dancing in a candle-lit cathedral and Ricky Martin soaking in a bathtub. An alluring array of beautiful dancers sensually writhe against one another and slowly move across a dark room lit by a warm glow.

Get push notifications with news, features and more.

Wisin and Yandel, who add urban flavor to the new track, disbanded as a popular duo in 2013 to pursue solo careers. They are reuniting for a world tour that kicks off Mar. 31 at the Altos de Chavón Amphitheatre in the Dominican Republic. The “Livin’ La Vida Loca” crooner collaborated with Wisin in 2014 on song “Adrenalina,” featuring Jennifer Lopez.
title: Watch Ricky Martin's New Music Video "Fiebre"
